posts.message: With world leaders at the ASEAN Summit. https://t.co/MAMeGGKwru
Extensive discussions with PM @AbeShinzo on the various ways to make India-Japan ties stronger & more diverse. https://t.co/QLHWaiwngb
Close ties with ASEAN is key to our Act East Policy. We seek more economic & people-to-people ties with ASEAN for benefit of our citizens.
Will attend the ASEAN-India Summit & East Asia Summit in Vientiane, Lao PDR on 7th & 8th September.  https://t.co/TmeToe9Mpp
Inspiring news from the constituency. Congratulations to all those who worked on this & joined the effort. https://t.co/4Z8LNyK8sL
Michhami Dukkadam. May the spirit of forgiveness & compassion enhance the spirit of harmony & togetherness in our society.
Nuakhai Juhar. Greetings to the people of Odisha on this special festival. May this festival bring more prosperity in the lives of farmers.
Discussions at G20 Summit were extensive & wide-ranging. I thank Chinese people & government for the great hospitality during the Summit.
Here are highlights of my intervention at the session on ‘Other Issues Affecting the World Economy.’ https://t.co/Sk8lf8igRT
Met President @mauriciomacri & had fruitful talks on increasing cooperation between India & Argentina. https://t.co/vvH3sb0I1M
Particularly highlighted India’s initiatives towards elimination of poverty, empowerment of poor & enhancing entrepreneurship among youth.
Spoke on ‘Inclusive & Interconnected Development’ & how it is important that fruits of progress reach every citizen. https://t.co/TwNFaqnvOT
Talked about vitality of knowledge & innovation driven economies and India emerging as a top destination for FDI. https://t.co/VoSBtYuHYi
At session on ‘Robust International Trade & Investment’ spoke on why global trade must respond to needs & priorities of developing nations.
Reiterated that G20 should work towards absolutely zero tolerance on black money & corruption. This will benefit the entire world.
Shared my thoughts at the session on ‘More Effective & Efficient Global Economic and Financial Governance. https://t.co/XIqeSJH302
Met President @RT_Erdogan and deliberated on bilateral relations between India and Turkey. https://t.co/cuIbXqeHZL
A fruitful interaction with @fhollande at the G20 Summit. France is one of India’s most valued partners. @Elysee https://t.co/0ZeZXPJZY4
Was delighted to meet PM @theresa_may & discuss ways to strengthen India-UK ties. @Number10gov. https://t.co/ZuqbzFz7Cu
How has your teacher influenced you? Share your anecdote & read what many others have written about their teachers. https://t.co/TYuxNNJfIf
Tributes to Dr. S Radhakrishnan, a scholar, statesman & a respected teacher who shaped many minds & served India. https://t.co/def2x8xwIR
Happy Teachers Day! India salutes the dedication & commitment of all teachers, whose role in nation building is paramount.
#GaneshChaturthi greetings to everyone. May the blessings of Lord Ganesh always remain with us. Ganpati Bappa Morya!
Sharing highlights of my intervention during one of the sessions of the Summit. https://t.co/d2K2DtKC6f
A picture of the G20 leaders. This is an important forum to discuss global challenges & how to overcome them. https://t.co/sevJc36yTl
Held talks with Mohammad bin Salman, Deputy Crown Prince of Saudi Arabia. https://t.co/GEOKJ8hQ1t
Sainthood of Mother Teresa is a memorable & proud moment. Had shared my views on it in detail during #MannKiBaat. https://t.co/udSaGMaHM5
Was told during our meeting that Shen Shu & his team worked for 4 months to complete the portrait. Touched & honoured by the gesture.
Thank you to painter Shen Shu & his team from Hangzhou’s Zhejiang Kaiming Art Gallery for the special gesture today. https://t.co/JLWvKdyjO1
Glad to meet Indophile Prof Wang. He translated 10 ancient Indian works including the Gita, Yoga Sutras into Chinese https://t.co/tRAhkJqMxe
Delighted to meet PM @TurnbullMalcolm. We discussed aspects of India-Australia relations & how to strengthen them. https://t.co/oXUd0mQPpP
Fruitful deliberations with BRICS leaders. Invited them to Goa for the BRICS Summit next month. https://t.co/RkfkwEfaKe
Had a very good meeting with President Xi Jinping. https://t.co/Of3uDE5EZN
RT @PMOIndia: I thank the people & government of Vietnam for the very good hospitality during my visit: PM @narendramodi
RT @PMOIndia: Thank you Vietnam. I will remember this visit as a memorable & productive one, that laid the ground for even better India-Vie…
RT @PMOIndia: A picture of the PM's meeting with Nguyen Phu Trong, General Secretary of the Communist Party. https://t.co/SrVUyQIiOv
RT @PMOIndia: President Tran Dai Quang and PM @narendramodi discuss India-Vietnam relations. https://t.co/oqnjAYZAfQ
RT @MEAIndia: Afternoon meetings begin with a call on Nguyen Thi Kim Ngan, Chairperson of the National Assembly of Vietnam https://t.co/Xii…
Here is the video of my interview last evening, which was aired on Network 18 channels. https://t.co/5zomuTQwBg
Feeling blessed after visiting Quan Su Pagoda. Had a great interaction with venerable monks. https://t.co/4wGcCfpw8w
I condole the passing away of Uzbekistan President Mr. Islam Karimov. May his soul rest in peace. https://t.co/Kp1eqGM4IC
Warm birthday greetings to the President of Sri Lanka, @MaithripalaS. May Almighty bless him with a long life and good health.
India is ready to partner Vietnam as the nation undergoes rapid development & strong economic growth. https://t.co/4vSJuCVjLd
People-to-people connect is at the core of India-Vietnam ties. PM Nguyen Xuan Phuc & I discussed ways to enhance our cultural relations.
Held extensive deliberations on boosting trade, economic cooperation & to deepen defence and security engagement between India and Vietnam.
We have agreed to scale up our bilateral engagement. Our common efforts will contribute to stability, security & prosperity in this region.
Held fruitful discussions with PM Nguyen Xuan Phuc. We talked about enhancing India-Vietnam relations. https://t.co/kWWkUDUIYb
Paid tributes to one of Asia’s tallest leaders, the great Ho Chi Minh. https://t.co/iKx9tEmas5
Here's the transcript of my interview with @18RahulJoshi. https://t.co/8FtKyQmLZJ
Reached Hanoi. This is a special visit & will go a long way in deepening the strong bond between India & Vietnam. https://t.co/TRoKPVHiDW
RT @firstpost: #PMSpeaksToNetwork18 Tonight at 9, catch @narendramodi at his most candid in a conversation with @18RahulJoshi https://t.co/…
RT @18RahulJoshi: From UP polls to Dalits, Kashmir, Lutyens culture and more. #PMSpeaksToNetwork18 in a freewheeling 90-min interview. http…
India is ready to be a reliable partner in fulfillment of Egypt's developmental, economic & security goals. https://t.co/bwXv0UzOkP
President Sisi & I agreed to build on multiple pillars of our cooperation & deepen the economic & people-to-people ties between our nations.
Delighted to welcome President Abdel Fattah Al Sisi on his 1st state visit to India. Our talks today were fruitful. https://t.co/8JCX9bgOni
Spoke about a wide range of issues in an interview with @18RahulJoshi, which will be aired tonight at 9 PM. https://t.co/7RB1ysL4yW
Will be in Hangzhou, China for G20 Summit, where I will interact with world leaders on key global issues. https://t.co/QrhwmYwTRw
My Vietnam visit starting today will further cement the close bond between India & Vietnam. https://t.co/7ifSW5PUS5
Greetings to the people of Vietnam on their National Day. Vietnam is a friendly nation with whom we cherish our relationship.
Dignity of labour is an article of faith for us. Our hardworking farmer & industrious worker should have access to the fruits of progress
